tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_solutions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  solution TEXT,
  best_practice TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TroubleshootingSolutions (
  solution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  problem_description TEXT,
  solution_description TEXT,
  reference_links TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BestPractices (
  practice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name TEXT,
  industry_sector TEXT,
  practical_application TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingScenarios (
  scenario_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scenario_name TEXT,
  scenario_description TEXT,
  required_tools TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TroubleshootingSolutions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    solution_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BestPractices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    practice_text TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Instructors (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Trainees (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    training_level INT,
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
)
